user.title: Configure Google Maps Weather
user.description:
Enter your Google Maps API key and location to get weather data.

⚠️ IMPORTANT: Free tier allows 1000 calls/month. Select an appropriate update interval to stay within the limit.

data_description.update_interval:
Update frequency. Options:
• 45 min (~960 calls/month) - Within limit
• 60 min (~720 calls/month) - Recommended ✓
• 90 min (~480 calls/month) - Conservative
• 120 min (~360 calls/month) - Very conservative
• 180 min (~240 calls/month) - Ultra conservative

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the API. Check your API key and internet connection.
